lenders.name: Seamus
lenders.loan_because: I like people.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide food and well being to those living in my area.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I do mission work in Haiti, and I see the great need for assitance to help folks help themselves.  KIVA fills a great need.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: We are So Blessed......

lenders.name: Ian Z
lenders.loan_because: Growing 3rd world economies help world economies, and because it's free.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: To help others that can't access money from other souces.

lenders.name: LISA & EMILY
lenders.loan_because: We are very fortunate and thankful for all we have.

lenders.name: kristen
lenders.loan_because: We all have an obligation to assist each other to improve the human condition and offer opportunity equally.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social worker specializing in mental health services for children.

lenders.name: Alejandro
lenders.loan_because: a little dignity goes a long way

lenders.name: Eddie
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I believe we can change the world, one small act at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children in an elementary school.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: this seems a good way to help
lenders.occupational_info: I am the pastor of a church in Northern Ireland

lenders.name: Lilian
lenders.loan_because: my son introduced me to this idea and I think it's a good way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the wife of a church pastor

lenders.name: Gerard
lenders.loan_because:
In a way, it's quite unfair that a relatively small part of the world's inhabitants owns an enormous percentage of all the world's resources. I feel very privilaged to have all I need for a decent living. 
In fact... it's embarrassing to have much more than I need. It's not a quality that I grew up in a country where I can afford me all the things I need... I feel obligated to share my wealth.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a teacher

lenders.name: Günter
lenders.loan_because: I spent much time in Asia and Africa. I want to show my sympathy to People who have less than I have and help them for a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel Internationally so sell products for the construction Industry

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: We need to spread the wealth.

lenders.name: Brian and Erin
lenders.loan_because: we believe in the power of individuals to change their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Erin is a Water Engineer - she builds wells, tanks, pumps, pipes and treatment systems to bring water to people in several cities.  Brian is a Computer Engineer - he works for a company which allows you to buy and sell items using the internet

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: I feel this will help people gain economic independence and education, and help change living conditions around the world.  It feels amazing to help someone who is a total stranger.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to become healthier AND happier through exercise and eating balanced, nutritious meals.

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage and empower women across the globe to be self sufficient and to take charge of their economic well being.

lenders.name: Berkant
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to do good.
lenders.occupational_info: IT consultant in the financial industry.

lenders.name: Susann
lenders.loan_because: My MBA group chose Kiva to study as a social/organizational network.  All of us in the group also wanted to help a business.

lenders.name: Chapel Hills Youth Group
lenders.loan_because: We like to help people
lenders.occupational_info: We are a teenage church group

lenders.name: Ralph
lenders.loan_because: I think that the loans are a great gift.  Receiving the loans and then repaying them allows the receiver to have more respect for himself.

lenders.name: Melody
lenders.loan_because: I believe in sharing.
lenders.occupational_info: I help school children complete their homework.

lenders.name: Kelley
lenders.loan_because: I image a world without poverty
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze blood samples from cancer patients and bone marrow donors.

lenders.name: Geoff & Regan
lenders.loan_because: We have always felt a need to give back to people without.  We hope that lending money through Kiva, we can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both Realtors, and have been helping people buy and sell homes for over 20 years.

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.occupation: Teacher of the Blind & Visually Impaired

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: So, that in some small way, I can improve the living situation of a family and encourage self sufficiency.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired now but am involved in a lot of volunteer work.

lenders.name: Jake
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: निर्वाण  Nirvana

lenders.name: Tracy & Josh
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with a supportive and loving family.  I want to pass along some of the help that I have received over the years.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a busy suburban library and get a kick out of helping people locate the resources they need.

lenders.name: Alejandro
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctor for children.

lenders.name: Ed and Sandy
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed with abundance and want to share that with others, especially women who just need a chance to lead more independent lives and better care for their families.  Everyone benefits from these loans!
lenders.occupational_info: Ed helps aerospace organizations and their leaders plan and implement successful business strategies.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: helping others satisfies me. Having toured through several developing countries, I appreciate the positivity I see in people, in spite of the fact they live in challenging conditions. Being the agent of positive change to others is wonderful.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed to have what I do and there's nothing like the joy that comes from knowing you are helping someone live a better life.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel connected to the rest of the world; I like the concept of the world-all the lenders-pooling small loans to make big differences in peoples' lives; my teen sons feel great that they can help someone even if the don't have lots of money.

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: it changes peoples lives

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: We are all one big family

lenders.name: Brooks
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves to be a part of the economy.
lenders.occupational_info: Mostly I help clean the water and soil of toxic chemicals and keep workers safe in their work with protective equipment.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy donating on KIVA.  I like that I get to search for just the right cause and watch them achive their goal.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer at a therapeutic  horseback riding facility and a library.

lenders.name: Pakpoom
lenders.occupation: Stock Analyst, Real Estate Developer, Speaker...
lenders.loan_because: To change the world, one entrepreneur at a time.

lenders.name: Sherri
lenders.loan_because: I can't give lots of money. But a little money here can go a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people (adults and children) with language and speech problem or feeding and swallowing problems.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: As a former small business owner I want to help women in developing countries be successful in their business so they can provide food, health care and education for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people start and grow businesses internationally.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: Mommy and daddy want me to learn about other parts of the world and how important it is to be generous.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother, a partner, a volunteer and somebody who helps companies market their solutions to other companies.

lenders.name: Danny
lenders.loan_because: Because I think its a great idea to help someone be self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Compliance Manager.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: It gives me pleasure to share what I have worked so hard to gather.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach health.  My classes have 20 people in them and I help people to think of better ways to act so that they can be healthy.

lenders.name: Christa-Lee
lenders.loan_because: Because it is a way I can help people fulfill their dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I own a restaurant and liquor store.

lenders.name: Thomas, New York
lenders.loan_because: I fully endorse the concept of Microfinance and am convinced that it can make a difference in many people's lives.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because:
I know how difficult it was for me to get a loan from a traditional banking institution to begin a business many years ago.
I can only imagine how much more challenging it would be in another country with limited access to capital markets.
I am honoured to play a part towards expanding entreprenurial independence.
Congratulations to those hard working men and women who have a dream to better themselves and their famillies.
lenders.occupational_info:
My business is helping others to see themselves as unique and capable of rising above mediocrity.

To help people become all that God designed them to be.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand every once and a while.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that the natural gas gets safely to the people that need it to keep there homes warm.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: "Without knowing who I am and why I am here, life is impossible.  The sole meaning of life is to serve humanity."  ~Leo Tolstoy
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a major newspaper company in the United States as a sales & marketing manager, editorial board member, and interactive media specialist.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I want to be able to help other people.

lenders.name: Professor D
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help those that have the drive to make their ideas into reality.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people about theatre and communications.

lenders.name: Douglas & Laura
lenders.loan_because: We can have a direct impact and help build a sustainable micro-economy for those that have a passion to succeed and improve their life for themselves and the people around them.
lenders.occupational_info: We work with teams to design retail and restaurants.

lenders.name: Molly & Merlin
lenders.occupation: Senior IT Manager Nike, & Financial Aid Tech
lenders.loan_because: This is an amazing opportunity to reach out to people who are trying to better their own circumstances but simply need a small bit of temporary assistance to do so...
lenders.occupational_info: We are both very fortunate to have the life we do.  It's great to be able to easily help other people better their lives as well.

lenders.name: Pats, Grant & Risa
lenders.loan_because:
Our philosophy is -
Give as much as you can,
as often as you're able.

lenders.name: ...andrian...
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people in developing countries a chance to succeed and pursue happiness. I am particularly interested in helping people from Ukraine, my home country, prosper!
lenders.occupational_info: I design and build buildings/sites for my company across the United States.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's our duty to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I run a computer software company

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: after a couple of years or so, all my loans have been repaid and I've simply turned the money over into new loans.  Great program.

lenders.name: marci
lenders.loan_because: my daughters gave me this opportunity for christmas 2008!
lenders.occupational_info: i am a NICU nurse-neonatal intensive care unit- where i take care of sick and premature babies and their families

lenders.name: Karla
lenders.loan_because:
I am blessed.
Micah 6:8  What does God desire of me?  Do justice, love kindness, and walk humbly with Him.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young children with developmental disabilities.  My goal is to help them catch up with their age-peers.

lenders.name: Cynthia and Jeff
lenders.loan_because: In our travels to other countries, we have been amazed the the power of each dollar in changing the lives of others.  Person to person loans will help alleviate poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher who works with students who have problems with learning and with their behavior.  Jeff works in a huge book store, an entire city block, three stories tall.

lenders.name: Rui Pinto
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: ..To make one human being happier.. one creature more comfortable..one heart more hopeful..this is our work!!
lenders.occupational_info: ... Business Consulting..

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I love being about to work with other people around the world, both fellow lenders and the lendees.
lenders.occupational_info: I help students build decent homes with those in need.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I spent a couple of years in South America and have seen how many of the people live.  I want to help those that are trying to improve their situations and that don't enjoy many of the comforts of life we have in the USA.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide banking and financing solutions to corporate customers in my region of the United States.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I believe together we can eradicate poverty and give families real options to take care of themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Christian minister working in a rural and suburban context in a progressive liberal denomination.

lenders.name: Wolfe Family
lenders.loan_because: The love of Christ compells us. He has given us so much to be thankful for.

lenders.name: Sérgio
lenders.loan_because: I want to foster entrepreneurship worldwide
lenders.occupational_info: I do great things using the Web as a canvas and as a communication channel.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: It's a good way to help spread prosperity.
lenders.occupational_info: Independent consulting

lenders.name: Isabelle E.
lenders.loan_because: I was a single mother in the United States and barely made ends meet for many years.  I can't imagine what it must be like for a woman in Tanzania.   I intend to loan to single mothers supporting their families with art.  I hope to share their experience with my young art students.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach art to 500 elementary students.   We study the arts of other cultures and times and practice things like calligraphy that you see in the background of my photograph.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a positive difference in the world.

lenders.name: Nikkia
lenders.loan_because: I understand that these loans have the ability to change individuals, families, communities, countries and ultimately our world for the better!
lenders.occupational_info: Ironically....helping individuals, families and communities live up to their potenial.

lenders.name: Charlie & Marianne
lenders.occupational_info: we are both in mental health services

lenders.name: Angelica
lenders.loan_because: I simply can!

lenders.name: Mr. Allison
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we would like to make a diffrence in this world. We want everyone to know we care.
lenders.occupational_info: We are full time students.  It is extremely hard being in Mr. Allison's class. We work all day and when we get home we have homework!  However, we all know it's worth the hard work now for our success in the future!

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance

lenders.name: Trevor
lenders.loan_because: My Aunt gave me a gift certificate to get involed.
lenders.occupational_info: High school student

lenders.name: Julie Bean
lenders.loan_because: I want to help ease the burden for even one person out there.  Especially those that are trying to make an honest living even though they may live in difficult circumstances.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a newspaper, directing news coverage of our community.

lenders.name: Christy
lenders.loan_because:
So little, does so much, not just for the one; but helps many.   

How easy is this!
lenders.occupational_info:
For 34.5 years, I worked as a Deputy Clerk of the Circuit Court in the County courthouse in Sarasota, FL.   I did all the Criminal Searches, plus deeds, leins etc.  

I now have retired to Dahlonega, GA

I am the creator of Christy's Bluebird Project helping to bring Bluebirds back in quanity.  There are now,over 90 Bluebird Trails in the Sarasota Manatee area, which have been put up  since 2002.  Through those Bluebird Trails, and other individuals,  800 plus bird houses have been set out.  My Bluebird Monitors report shows over 600 Bluebird fledgings each year.  I then can report their reported breeding information to Cornell University, or they now can report directly themselves.  I now am expanding my project to include Georgia.

I also sponsor 3 kids in 3 different countries.  Through   www.Galilee.org ,  The Plan,  and Compassion.  

Helping kids and their school and communities, is great. and now I can help adults through   www.kiva.org  individuals or groups, to help themselves, which then will help their communities.

lenders.name: Shaylin
lenders.loan_because: I like to feel like I'm making a difference

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to share the good fortune I've enjoyed in my life.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: To give people all over the world a chance for the life they wish.

lenders.name: Ralph
lenders.loan_because: I want to help save the world, one person at a time. I know that sounds naive, but it is true. I especially want to help women in Africa, South America and Asia, as in many cultures in these parts of the world women often have second-class status.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired university professor. I did cancer and AIDS research for many years. I still teach a course on AIDS ("AIDS: biomedical, social and ethical issues").  I am particularly concerned about the impact AIDS has had in Sub-Saharan Africa.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: it is a personal way to be involved in helping others lift themselves out of poverty.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I want to share. My family is so fortunate. God bless and Peace!

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed and I want to help out where I can.

lenders.name: Charlette
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Corporate cog.

lenders.name: Marko
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in developing countries to be able to help themselves and be proud of taking care of their children and families. Additionally I want to in general promote entrepreneurship around the world.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I believe working at the grassroots level is a more effective way of reaching those who would not  normally be given loans by bigger institutions.

lenders.name: Melody
lenders.loan_because: I am so very blessed!
lenders.occupational_info: I am so blessed to work in jobs where I am able to help others. I work for a program that assists those who are handicapped and those who have children that are sick or injured and are far away from home.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference in someone else's life... and mine too.
lenders.occupational_info: Keeping things organized and efficient as best I can!

lenders.name: gabriella and mom
lenders.loan_because: it makes us feel more connected to the world.
lenders.occupational_info: neverending

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: People are not as fortunate as me so I need to help people keep their daily lives a float and thriving so they can help their economy and their families.

lenders.name: Aaron & Andrea
lenders.loan_because: it gives people opportunities

lenders.name: Thebluestbutterfly
lenders.loan_because: I can at least help a little bit in this troubled world.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I want to help improve the lives of others.

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because:
People with access to resources receive a moral and spiritual benefit from sharing them with those with less access. Access is a result of multiple factors, many of them unearned, such as shared cultural assumptions, birth, education, or privilege.

Only by acknowledging our privilege and our reliance on institutionalized patterns of exploitation and domination can we begin to heal ourselves and our planet. I envision a future in which new patterns of partnership and collaboration replace domination systems, and microlending is an important part of building that future.
lenders.occupational_info: I write documentation that helps people understand how to use database software. People use these databases for a great variety of purposes, some of which are beneficial to society.

lenders.name: Tom & Amy
lenders.loan_because: People who are trying to help themselves are an inspiration.  It is a joy to assist them on their journey toward a better way of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a teacher for more than 15 years.  I enjoy teaching children to read.  My husband has worked for a large oil company for more than 25 years.  He helps to identify new catalysts and identifies unknown contaminants.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want people to see they can transform their own lives with just a little help.  Sometimes a loan is all that is needed to help someone improve his or her life.
lenders.occupational_info: I oversee the entire computer systems for a global company.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to prosper and grow.
lenders.occupational_info: My job allows me to enhance access to health care by convincing physicians and hospitals to open their doors to the poor.

lenders.name: Chul Kyo
lenders.loan_because: I know how much help people can get from our microcredit loans. I know how frustrating it is when I have the initiative but lack the resources to do something.
lenders.occupational_info: I study, preparing to study in American universities. Currently a senior.

lenders.name: SolaMathe
lenders.loan_because:
Several reasons:
* I believe it is another avenue for Christ to minister through.
* I personally care.
* If these people believe in themselves to make an impact in their community, that is something I want to support.
* I believe greater economic position opens doors of opportunity.

lenders.name: kay
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: It feels good.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: kiva makes the world a better place - one entrepreneur at a time
lenders.occupational_info: I advise companies on how to improve the experiences they offer to customers

lenders.name: Josie
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance in life
lenders.occupational_info: I've traveled the world and have seen so many people in need. This is a great chance to make a difference!

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is the obligation of people to help other people however they can I am lucky enough to have enough money to be able to lend so I do.

lenders.name: Beate
lenders.loan_because: Because I want everybody to live a liveable life.

lenders.name: v.k.
lenders.loan_because: to do better for the needy people
lenders.occupational_info: with the help of an advisor in any field the person can reach to the highest

lenders.name: Femke
lenders.loan_because: It gives me a good feeling to make a world of difference to people I don't even know with a small amount of money. Our princess Maxima is a great advocate for microcredit and on Oprah I heard of Kiva. So these women gave me this idea to make a contribution to developmental aid.

lenders.name: RobiNZ
lenders.loan_because: It's income from something I do for fun. The amount wouldn't change my standard of living but might help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I use design software for work, write about it on my blog for fun

lenders.name: Harrie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people

lenders.name: julia
lenders.loan_because: "It is better to light a candle, than to curse the darkness"

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves by implementing their ideas using their own ingenuity, commitment and hard work
lenders.occupational_info: I work to get tropical forests sustainably managed and this involves a lot of work with indigenous and local communities

lenders.name: Catharina
lenders.loan_because: I know that it can make a big differense to someone who wants to change her life, make it better for herself and her children
lenders.occupational_info: I travel as tour leader with swedish tourists all over the world

lenders.name: Fabiana
lenders.loan_because: I'm a advocate , I work on city hall of my city and I would like to open my proper business. Meu husband is doctor veterinarian ago fourteen years and exists a house for rent besides our clinic in a optimal dot commercial.
lenders.occupational_info: Highly profitable because we've four thousand customers cadastral , the dot commercial is extremely busy and we've experience of fourteen years in that business.

lenders.name: Dale & Christine
lenders.loan_because: Everybody needs a helping hand at some point in time.  After having a student from the Central African Republic live with us for many years, we learned to appreciate how difficult life can be for people in developing countries and how hard they will work to better their lives if given an opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: Christine is now retired, but was a director of human relations for a major spice company. Dale, also retired, was a university geography teacher and a travel tour company owner.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: Although I don't have large amounts of money to give away, Kiva lets me help others.
lenders.occupational_info: College students come to my office to talk about dealing with school work and college life, and I try to help them.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I have worked first hand with micro-financing in Afghanistan and have seen the positive impact it has on people's lives.

lenders.name: Silvia
lenders.loan_because: A small gesture can have a big impact....

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: McGrath Family - Canada
lenders.loan_because: Kiva sounds like a great way to try and help

lenders.name: Daan & Robin
lenders.loan_because: Start with a small gesture that can change the world. Make it a better place for everyone!!

lenders.name: Miosotis

lenders.name: Kieron
lenders.loan_because: Kiva sounds like a wonderful way to help people who would never be visible to international aid agencies.
lenders.occupational_info: I represent people who have been taken advantage of by money lenders and sellers of goods.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I think that everyone should have the same opportunities to access financial resources, not only to achieve economic prosperity but especially to increase with their works and projects, happiness and self-esteem.

lenders.name: M&T
lenders.loan_because: Giving back something, anything, is better than nothing..... so the world is a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: M is an Insurance Agent helping to protect people everyday. T works at an elementary school and helps students with special needs.

lenders.name: Jennifer and Jason
lenders.loan_because: what better way to make a change in someone's life.

lenders.name: Guy

lenders.loan_because: I'm amazed that a small act on my part can join with the actions of others to make a big impact on the life of someone else

lenders.name: Rolf
lenders.loan_because: It's a brilliant idea
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching psychology

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people who are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites that try to sell you things.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: such a small amount of help can make a big difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: per
lenders.loan_because: It is wonderful to be able to help people and with a rather small effort make a difference for someone else!
lenders.occupational_info: Im a deputy project manager for Scandinavias largest tourism fair in Gothenburg! The name of the fair is TUR and attract approx 40 000 visitors each spring!

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Those who can, should.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their goals and help their families and friends.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a marketer - helping change the world one small loan at a time.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I think we need more sharing and caring in the world. Humanism rocks.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and do research.

lenders.name: Lane
lenders.loan_because: I feel God has put all of us on this earth to help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I promote a company that sends care givers to elders homes to help make their day easier and better.

lenders.name: Phillips/Cullor families
lenders.loan_because: The Phillips and Cullor families have made a tradition each Christmas to donate to a charity.  When we found out about Kiva, we thought this is a perfect charity because it is a gift that keeps on giving!

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to make every dollar live up to its value.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: we are all on this journey of  life together and we should help each other along the way.

lenders.name: cristina
lenders.loan_because: We can make god things happen!

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: artist

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: This is what I love to do! You get more than you give as they say.

lenders.name: Mollie
lenders.loan_because: If I needed more money to survive I would hope people would lend to me.

lenders.name: Steve, Ashley, and Kenendy
lenders.loan_because: We are trying to teach our 6 year-old the value of money, but more importantly, the values of love, kindness, and helping others.

lenders.name: Vicky
lenders.loan_because: We are all one.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a crisis center, primarily with people who are psychotic or suicidal.  They may need just support or may need to go to a psychiatric hospital.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I live in a country with so many opportunities, I would like to help others in the world have the same opportunities that I do.

lenders.name: Stephane
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: In a business, my job is to get the product or service to those who can use it. It involves the product or service's development, pricing, promotion and distribution.

lenders.name: John and Aubra
lenders.loan_because: We Care.

lenders.name: Lauri
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life and want to share that . It feels good to give some one a hand-up.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I root for the underdog and I love helping people more than anything else.
lenders.occupational_info: I do whatever the  engineering/ environmental consulting company that I work for tells me to do.  When I'm not working I love backpacking and foosball.

lenders.name: Katrina
lenders.loan_because: I want to help support other people who are trying to help themselves and their communities.  When I get more, I give more.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist working in multidisicipline.  I work with imges and words of women and people who have made a difference in this world.  I am a professional seamstress and crafts person.  I build costumes for Broadway shows, films and the circus.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I do not have everything that I desire, but I have seen people around the world who need it more than I do.  They need a fair chance and opportunity to make it on their own and I hope that I can be just a miniscule catalyst for them to reach their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is a technical business consultant for a very large global company.  But my work and dreams go much further than making a global company succeed.  The world will never be fair, but I will do what I can to put those in need, on a level playing field with the rest of the world.

lenders.name: Henrik & Morín
lenders.loan_because: We want to promote entrepreneurship and solidarity.
lenders.occupational_info: Software Developer & Project Manager

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.  Living in a very prosperous country, I feel we should help others that are attempting to help themselves.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: When I read the news I feel so helpless and this is a little thing to do to help someone in another part of the world.  It personalizes the tremendous struggles others face and I hope it gives recipients hope knowing there are people out there rooting for them.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher  and now photography helps me to see rather than just look and has opened my eyes to beauty all around me.

lenders.name: Viki
lenders.loan_because: This is one way I can help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office on computer software projects.

lenders.name: Mark & Janette
lenders.loan_because: It's always nicer to help someone else in need. No matter how big or small. We only hope that this puts a smile on someone else's face, as it did on ours.
lenders.occupational_info: Mark has worked in a Grocery Store for 15 years. Janette has worked in a Department Store for the past couple months. We both enjoy our jobs and helping others, but our greatest accomplishment is that we have 3 great children at home.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: you have to "be the change that you wish to see in the world" ― Mahatma Gandhi

lenders.name: Steven & Jacq
lenders.loan_because: We love the idea of Kiva.  Helping people to help themselves.. and with this philosophy, it enables us to help the beautiful people of Indonesia, especially the Balinese.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I wanted my nieces and nephew and I to do something together that would help make a positive impact in other people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help nurses and hospital workers advocate for themselves and their patients.

lenders.name: Hope
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I do Statistics, English, Compartaive Governements, Economics, Human Geography, and Art History classes at my school :)

lenders.name: Heather, ON, Canada
lenders.loan_because: I have seen what these loans can do for people.  I am particularly partial to helping women.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a storyteller.  I use stories to help people advertise their businesses.

lenders.name: Brett, Pullman, WA
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy the act of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to become a special education teacher.  I will teach students with special needs.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: PZ
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who can't help themselves.

lenders.name: John & Christine
lenders.loan_because: it's easy to make a little difference!

lenders.name: Gabriel
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that lends to non-profit organizations and helps them own real estate.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed our family.  We hope that these loans will in some small way help out the families receiving them!

lenders.name: Mr. Bean
lenders.loan_because: I like being able to directly assist the poor, while knowing that the loan will be used wisely and under guidance, so that I am not fostering dependence, but rather progress and independence.

lenders.name: The Hendersons
lenders.loan_because: Life has been good to us, we hope to make life better for others as well.
lenders.occupational_info: Senior Executive in a Software Company

lenders.name: Matti
lenders.occupation: General Secratary of a student union

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.occupational_info: I manage people who write computer programs for the state of Ohio

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.occupation: Sales Trainer, Sales Consultant, Sales Coach
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping hardworking business people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people become confident in sales

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the capacity of others to succeed.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: my money can go a lot further to other people than it can with me...
lenders.occupational_info: Empathetic, driven individual!

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to share what I have and make the world a better place.  I believe that the people I can sponsor through Kiva just need a little help.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I grew disillusioned with traditional charity where paid students with clipboards try to sign you up on the street.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in journalism, trying to make sense of climate change, health issues, environmental issues etc...

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I have been really blessed, have been given a big break in my life, and therefore would love to give others an opportunity to reach their dreams.

lenders.name: Kat
lenders.loan_because: I think people with a vision deserve the funding to see it through.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a horse trainer

lenders.name: Paul Williams
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the world, by helping others make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find solutions for their problems.

lenders.name: Lucy
lenders.loan_because:
I love people and food(especially food) so I really felt
like I should help someone in the restaurant business.
Food is good.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to make sure all of our cat family get along.

lenders.name: Brent
lenders.loan_because: I've done a lot of travel in Africa and Asia and have seen the impact of giving someone a chance...

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I want to support folks who are in need to become self sufficient.  I have a particularl in terest i Guaemala and Mexico and other parts of Central America.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to do office work in a college child care center for children of student parents.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself, so it's great to be able to help others get started with their own businesses.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help people improve their lives and the lives of their dependents by establishing and running businesses of their own
lenders.occupational_info: I build cabinets, and furniture for people's homes.  I try to put love into all of my work so that whatever I do makes it a happier home

lenders.name: Savitha & Pradhip
lenders.loan_because: I wanna help to succeed in their life.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Mary Ellyn & Ron
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in other people's lives and give them a chance to live a little more comfortably.  More power to them!!!
lenders.occupational_info: Since we are now retired, we enjoy traveling around the U.S. and Canada.  As well, our four children (and spouses) and nine grandchildren live in the area, so baby-sitting is a frequent activity.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: Microfinancing has the potential to become the greatest financial resource to empower the third world.
lenders.occupational_info: I study English literature.

lenders.name: leslie
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel fantastic and it might change someone's life, who might changes more lives and I might have made a difference.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I want others to have access to resources that will enable them to realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for many different companies (a lot of non profit organizations) performing audits of their financial information. This is required by their their Board of Governors or by the Federal Government (because they provide funds to these organizations).

lenders.name: Carlos Gonzalez
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the less fortunate.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research to understand and develop treatments for diseases of the brain.

lenders.name: abby
lenders.occupation: artist. owner of a small clay studio.

lenders.name: Rosemarie
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to need money to start a business
lenders.occupational_info: I have just sold my business. I started like you, 20 years ago with a small amount of money. I built my business up to a good size and then sold. I am working for the new owners for 2 years  to help with the transition and then I will retire. Good luck! I know you can do it.

lenders.name: Svetlana
lenders.loan_because: I believe that each of us by doing his/her small part will ultimately make a difference.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage small business all over the world.  As a small business owner, someone once took a chance on me and I too want to do the same for someone else.  I also want to set an example for my daughters that giving is the greatest way of receiving.
lenders.occupational_info: I create internet web sites for businesses, non profit organizations and events.  I encourage entrepreneurship especially in women.  I enjoy helping people help them selves.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: It's a very personal way to make an impact
lenders.occupational_info: Mid-level bureaucrat

lenders.name: Adail Miller
lenders.loan_because: I need some help for my company.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a company in Brazil that make environmental services like projects

lenders.name: SM Youth Group
lenders.loan_because: We care about people!  We are a blessed group and see it as our call to help others whenever we can.

lenders.name: Tatsuo
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a contribution to some african or asian persons who wish to begin on new works.
lenders.occupational_info: a japanese company's founder

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: something so easy for me can mean so much to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to reduce the impacts of droughts and floods in developing countries.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I believe in counting one's blessings and sharing it with others.  Paying it forward is great motto.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because:
I've wandered through so many developing nations over the years, I know what a difference a micro-loan can make to a family.  Bonus: It just feels good

I also tend to lend within nations that I've traveled too in the past.  It just makes it more 'real' for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly airplanes that transport people and cargo all over the world.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: On behalf of the UW-L Eagles soccer team.  This is our collection of $$ to help those in need wherever they may be in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: University teacher and coach.

lenders.name: KCwomentowomen
lenders.loan_because: We want to help other women.  We want to help them be independent and take care of their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Two teachers, a social worker, and two administrators

lenders.name: Toni
lenders.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate as a Christmas present.  What a deLightful gift to receive and give!
lenders.occupational_info: Teach metaphysics and quantum physics as they refer to the world of the soul.

lenders.name: Ilan
lenders.loan_because: I've experienced the hospitality of the citizens of many of the countries where Kiva loans are made, and this is a wonderful way to say, "Thank You!"

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: My goal is to help those less fortunate than me and I think this is a great way to do it!
